name: Hardest Cube Game
description:
Play now for FREE one of the most difficult games of the Appstore!

Move the red square with the big eye, collect the 3 cherries on each level and wake the blue square up.
It's easy to play: use the virtual pad to move the red square and once you have collected all the cherries, move to the blue square to complete the level.
However, be careful not to touch your enemies or you will have to restart the game!

Will you be good enough to complete all the 45 levels on the 3 difficulty settings of the game?
Try it now and compare your score with your friends and the entire world!

FEATURES :
- 45 insane levels
- 3 difficulty settings
- Leaderboard
- Funny dialogs in all levels
- Good music and sounds effects
- Nice pixel graphics and funny animations

Support Game Center
